input.value: Corporate Technology - Big Data Engineer Lead

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt

font.font: The Corporate Technology (CT) organization develops applications and provides technology support for corporate functions across JPMorgan Chase, including Global Finance, Corporate Treasury, Risk Management, Human Resources, Compliance, Legal, and all functions within the Corporate Administrative Office including the Global Security and Investigations organization (GS&I).

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-layout-grid-align: none
MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal

br.p: The GS&I organization is responsible for the physical security, pre-employment processing, resiliency, crisis management and investigations functions across JPMC?s global foot print. The Global Security Technology (GST) organization within CT team develops and implements technology solution to support GS&I functions.

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal

font.font: One of GS&I?s key programs is to proactively identify and manage internal risk by ingesting data from multiple sources applying rules and risk modelling techniques to detect questionable actions, flagging and escalating threats for investigation.

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal
MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px
MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal

font.font: We are currently seeking a seasoned Software Engineer with strong experience in Big Data and Analytics implementations to lead the development and implementation components of this program. The selected candidate will be integral contributor in driving this firm-wide initiative forward by modernizing the technology delivery, working with external and internal partners in the implementation of the solution using Agile practices.

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal
MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt
MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1

font.font: As a VP, Software Engineer Lead, will be responsible for the overall software development, implementation and integration components of and configuration of In-House and 3rd Party Solutions for this program.

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 3pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal
MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1

font.font: Collaborate with our internal GS&I, Internal and External Technology teams towards the successful implementation of the technical solutions supporting this program.

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in
MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1

font.font: Provide technical leadership to Solutions Integration and other Software Engineers.

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in
MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1

font.font: Take ownership and accountability for the deliverables in all phases of the development lifecycle.

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in
MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1

font.font: Work closely with Business Analyst Leads and Product Owners to understand LOB technology drivers, requirements and their impact on architecture design.

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in
MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1

font.font: Partner with the Infrastructure Architecture Leads and 3rd Party Vendor in defining and designing target state architecture and a strategic roadmap in line with JPMC Big Data standards.

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in
MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1

font.font: Deploy
effective solutions to complex technical integrations, including expansion of risks models using JSON and Python and data ingestion from
Spark/Hadoop data lake into
NoSQL
MongoDB.

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in
MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; mso-margin-top-alt: auto

font.font: Perform Proof-of-Concepts on Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Statistical Models using Bayesian Networks.

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in
MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; mso-margin-top-alt: auto

font.font: Estimate effort, code, test and implement
incremental

span.style: FONT-WEIGHT: normal; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold; mso-ansi-language: en

font.font: Agile
production-like deliverables.

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in
MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt 0.5in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; mso-margin-top-alt: auto

font.font: Adhere to architecture standards, risk management, security guidelines and data management policies.

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in
MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; mso-margin-top-alt: auto

font.font: Participate and partner with other teams on the end-to-end integration testing effort.

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in
MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; mso-margin-top-alt: auto

font.font: Participate in users meetings with product owners to get a better understanding of users ideas, issues and product backlog.

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal
MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2

font.font: 10+ years of relevant development life cycle experience in systems and applications management including systems/application design.

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal
MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2

font.font: 7+ years hands-on experience in

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in
MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 1in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level2 lfo2

font.font: Implementing vendor solutions, with strong knowledge of Integration Architecture.

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 1in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level2 lfo2

font.font: Development of application solutions in multiple technologies and design techniques.

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 1in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level2 lfo2

font.font: Working across large environments with multiple operating systems / infrastructure.

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in
MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2

font.font: Strong leadership skills and demonstrated ability to manage team members and external business consultants and vendors.

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal
MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2

font.font: Demonstrated track record of delivering multiple, complex technical projects on time/within budget.

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in
MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2

font.font: Experience in full-lifecycle project management methodologies and tools including Agile.

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in
MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2

font.font: Excellent written and oral communication skills and demonstrated ability to interact with all technical and non-technical members of the organization including senior management.

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal
MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-layout-grid-align: none; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2

font.font: Must have strong hands-on development and implementation experience on the following technologies:

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-layout-grid-align: none
MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 1in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-layout-grid-align: none; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level2 lfo2

font.font: Spark

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 1in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-layout-grid-align: none; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level2 lfo2

font.font: Hadoop

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 1in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-layout-grid-align: none; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level2 lfo2

font.font: HBase

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 1in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-layout-grid-align: none; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level2 lfo2

font.font: MongoDB

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 1in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-layout-grid-align: none; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level2 lfo2

font.font: Oracle

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 1in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-layout-grid-align: none; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level2 lfo2

font.font: Java

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 1in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-layout-grid-align: none; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level2 lfo2

font.font: Python

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 1in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-layout-grid-align: none; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level2 lfo2

font.font: XML/JSON data-interchange

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.75in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-layout-grid-align: none
MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-layout-grid-align: none; mso-add-space: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2

font.font: Strong understanding of internals of Spark and Hadoop e.g. DataFrame, DAG, data partition and distribution, named node limitations, MapReduce concepts and tuning.

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-layout-grid-align: none

font.font: At least a bachelor?s degree in computer science, software engineering
or information technology.

button.class: btn btn-primary btn-lg dice-btn apply disableButton
btn btn-default dice-btn-secondary hidden-md hidden-lg hidden-xl

div.div: For over 200 years, JPMorgan Chase & Co has provided innovative financial solutions for consumers, small businesses, corporations, governments and institutions around the world. Today, we're a leading global financial services firm with operations servicing clients in more than 100 countries. Whether we are serving customers, helping small businesses, or putting our skills to work with partners, we strive to identify issues and propose solutions that will propel the future and strengthen both our clients and our communities.
